8-1121.Exemption or exception; burden of proof.

In any proceeding under the Securities Act of Nebraska, the burden of proving an exemption or an exception from a definition shall be upon the person claiming it.

SourceLaws 1965, c. 549, ยง 21, p. 1797;Laws 1998, LB 894, ยง 5.

Annotations

Defendant bears the burden of proving a claim of exemption when raising the issue as a defense to a charge of unlawful sale of unregistered securities. State v. Fries, 214 Neb. 874, 337 N.W.2d 398 (1983).
